title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 54.7 - American vessels under enrollment, American vessels under register and foreign vessels: license requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 54.7 - American vessels under enrollment, American vessels under register and foreign vessels: license requirements

State Regulations

Pilots shall not be assigned to American vessels under
enrollment unless they hold the appropriate Federal license. Pilots shall not
be assigned to American vessels under register and foreign vessels on routes
not covered by their State license. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
54.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
